VirtualBox - VMs etc

  • Add a rule for incoming RDP to robert-winxp-vm01
    vboxmanage setextradata robert-winxp-vm01 "VBoxInternal/Devices/e1000/0/LUN#0/Config/rdp/HostPort" 3389
vboxmanage setextradata robert-winxp-vm01 "VBoxInternal/Devices/e1000/0/LUN#0/Config/rdp/GuestPort" 3389
vboxmanage setextradata robert-winxp-vm01 "VBoxInternal/Devices/e1000/0/LUN#0/Config/rdp/Protocol" TCP
